alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 6:30AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Flint River near Griffin affecting Fayette and Spalding Counties. Oconee River near Penfield affecting Greene, Oconee and Clarke Counties. Oconee River near Dublin affecting Wilkinson, Laurens, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Alabama... Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19 affecting Talbot, Upson, Taylor and Crawford Counties. Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Washington, Wilkinson and Baldwin Counties. Chattahoochee River at Columbus affecting Muscogee, Chattahoochee, Lee and Russell Counties. Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Jones, Houston, Bibb, Monroe and Twiggs Counties. Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and forecast to continue. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23 feet, Moderate flooding continues. Portions of the Old Balls Ferry Road leading to the boat ramp becomes flooded with a foot of water or more. The entire dirt parking lot near the boat ramp is under three to five feet of water. Extensive flooding of the woodlands near the river continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 21.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 17 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
